title: TRUEWERK B1 Sun Long Sleeve Tee for Men, Sun Protection Shirts, Moisture Wicking, UPF +50 Thermo Regulating Shirt
description: Work Shirts Built for Comfort and Performance: This TRUEWERK B1 long sleeve work shirt is lightweight, moisture wicking, breathable and contains 50+ UPF protection for maximum comfort
Easy Wearing, Hard Working: This long sleeve work shirt for men features an athletic cut and form-flattering fabric that is comfortable and handles the rigors of the job site

Performance Work Shirt: B1 work shirts are designed from a breathable performance knit fabric to deliver all day comfort and moisture wicking treatment to guarantee a fast dry with maximum breathability
UV Protection: This work shirt is thermo-regulating and provides UV protection to help keep you cool and shield your skin from the sun's rays during any outdoor activity
Durable Work Shirt: Men's long sleeve shirt with athletic fit is 100% polyester and machine washable for easy care
